thread.title: Skytree to Present Webinar on the Future of Data Science
thread.title_full: Skytree to Present Webinar on the Future of Data Science

author: admin
title: Skytree to Present Webinar on the Future of Data Science
text:
Submitted by admin on 9/8/2015 @ 9:19 AM Companies mentioned in this article: Skytree 
SAN JOSE, CA -- (Marketwired) -- 09/08/15 -- Skytree , the leader in enterprise machine learning on big data, today announced it will be presenting a webinar featuring Forrester Research focused on key trends, challenges and emerging solutions that signal the future of data science. This webinar will include guest industry analyst Mike Gualtieri of Forrester Research, and Alexander Gray, Ph.D., Skytree's chief technology officer (CTO) and co-founder. 
The webinar will offer insights on the challenges and bottlenecks data scientists face in big data projects that are stunted by the lack of enterprise-grade big data tools and technologies, the use of machine learning at scale and fast model building and deployment. It will also offer strategies into how big data platforms, machine-learning algorithms, automation and self-service tools help overcome key challenges within the industry. 
Who: Mike Gualtieri, principal analyst at Forrester Research Alexander Gray, Ph.D., Skytree CTO and co-founder 
What: Webinar: The Future of Data Science 
Where:
